app_name: Groups Control Groups Messenger Apps DaTalk Chat with Koreans
app_description: DaTalk is an engaging chat app that allows people from all over the world to meet and interact with Koreans. When you start a conversation with someone it marks the beginning of a new connection! With this app you can have deep conversations with matched Korean users. DaTalk offers private messaging enabling one on one chats photo sharing and the opportunity to learn more about Korean culture. It s ideal for global users interested in K pop K dramas and various other aspects of Korean content. Boasting over 18 million members DaTalk serves as a community for those eager to engage with Koreans. Popular on the App Store this app facilitates one on one conversations with Korean individuals. DaTalk requires only a nickname and age with no need for other personal information ensuring privacy and anonymity. This system supports sincere and in depth conversations. You can also express closeness by sending points to people you find interesting. If you re looking to start new interactions and conversations with Koreans download DaTalk now!
